title: Viral video showing dead bodies of Coronavirus victims in Italy is actually from sci-fi series | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video clip is being shared on the internet where dead bodies can be seen lying on the floor and being dumped at a place. The claims are being made that the video is from Coronavirus hit Italy.

ALSO READ: Indian Army has set up a 1000-bed quarantine facility in Barmer,…

NewsMobile fact-checked the video and found that it has been taken from a TV series.

We extracted the keyframes on the video through InVid tool and put them through Reverse Image Search, and we found a YouTube link to the same video clip on Yandex.

We then ran a search on YouTube with relevant keywords and found that the scene is from a TV series named Pandemic, released in 2007. We also found that parts of the series is available on YouTube.

The viral clip has been taken from the 1:01:52 mark of the above video.

The above information proves that the viral clip is part of a fictional series and is not real.
